name: Box Collider 3D
description:
Box Collider 3D.

Point of the game is to dodge grey obstacles and avoiding from falling off the edge.  Each level can be won by reaching the end of the map.

This is a full game with 5 different levels. Use "a" and "d" to move.

Very similar to my earlier protoype "Sphere Collision 3D" only with a different outlook and more advanced gameplay.

Zip File contains everything you need to play the game!
